html:
7.31.20  8:23 pm   Are you a cake 

      no but i can see why you would think that

7.31.20  8:20 pm   are the dodgers going to win the world series?

      i will admit that does seem possible

7.31.20  8:11 pm   have you tried making irregular music?

      that's preposterous. who do you think i am

7.31.20  8:08 pm   there are a few tiktok pages posting your old YouTube videos and they seem a bit suspicious. thoughts? is one of them actually you?

      absolutely not

7.31.20  8:06 pm   What's your relationship with metronomes like?

      i mostly use it for writing, to make sure i don't slip into what i call a tempo crisis

7.31.20  6:40 pm   is there something more perfect than perfect

      no but there is something better than perfect. (everything)

7.31.20  6:18 pm   can you make infinite songs please 

      YES HOW DID YOU KNOW THAT'S EXACTLY WHAT I'M GOING TO DO

7.31.20  6:18 pm   Do you appreciate eggs?

      yes

7.31.20  5:11 pm   How do you come up with lyrics for your songs?

      musically

7.31.20  4:52 pm   Thoughts on really huge spiders? What about astonishingly tiny spiders?

     so far i don't know anything about them except their size

7.31.20  4:12 pm   if you wrote a book, what would be the most important word to the book that is only used once

      juxtapose

7.31.20  4:06 pm   HI MY NAMES STEVE

      i want to believe you

7.31.20  3:27 pm   have you ever intentionally re-used a motif from one song in another song?

      yes but not very often

7.31.20  1:43 pm   can we have a hint about the videos you're working on/ when we might see them?

      every Tuesday would be nice

7.31.20  12:46 pm   Once you get your wheel invented and some fresh content out on the platforms, will we get some more reality posts as well? 

      HECK YEAH, OF RESOUNDING THUNDER

7.31.20  12:32 pm   Where did the home go in the song "La dee da dee da dee da dee way oh"?

      i threw it in the trash, as a way to contrast the rest of the song which is decidedly and overwhelmingly out-of-trash

7.31.20  12:30 pm   Help I have writers block

      you might have to go to another planet

7.31.20  11:07 am   are you working on a new video?

      i am working on video making

7.31.20  9:18 am   alright your jingles have been playing inside my head for the past 5 days i literally cant bear with it anymore its affecting my job performance, family relationships and my gf broke up with me. why is everything so catchy?

      can't you see i'm trying to destroy the universe

7.31.20  8:56 am   In the anwser of the question "7.30.20  6:29 pm ", was there the first time you used crossed out text?

      absolutely not

7.31.20  8:48 am   do you like biochemistry and molecular biology

      maybe if it had way more molecules, and chemicals

7.31.20  8:02 am   Do you play the BASS?

      oh that would explain a lot

7.31.20  7:35 am   What's your home planet look like?

      sort of like a blue marble

7.31.20  7:02 am   WhAt's YoUr FaVoRiTe TrEe

      the kind that grows on trees

7.31.20  5:24 am   If you're learning 3D animation, can you tell us a bit more about it?

      scientists have estimated that it's impossible

7.31.20  4:14 am   are you really smart or is that not true

      we'll see

7.31.20  3:38 am   Are you going to make a video, and a thousand videos after that?

      was thinking of putting the 1 somewhere in the middle of the other thousand

7.31.20  1:44 am   Do you create music in the effort to trigger unique emotions in different people or to make a point and express yourself the best way you know how?

      those are both good explanations. but there's always more explanations

7.31.20  1:09 am   Can you include a pool table in your next song please?

      sure

7.31.20  12:25 am   Your thoughts on eggs?

      just when you think they are round, you realize they are even more interesting

7.31.20  12:22 am   Hello and goodbye, do you feel alright, do you feel fine with the days gone by?

     oh now you've got me thinking

      But what's the inspiration behind the project?

     common sense really

     Hope you're not stressed out with the big project and all.

     i am

     People still miss you though. - Grim Reaper

7.31.20  12:21 am   If you had to choose a historical event to dedicate your life to teaching to the youth of the world, what would it be and why?

      can i teach the future instead

7.31.20  12:21 am   why do i have such bad luck

      because your skills are stronger so that's the only way it would be fair

7.30.20  11:59 pm   what do you spend your time doing other than things related to your website and youtube? do you have any hobbies or aspirations?

      was hoping to figure out what everything means. and then maybe transfer that information on to you if i can come up with a common language

7.30.20  11:47 pm   any tips for recording vocals?

      you have to mean the lyrics. or at least think you do at the time that you sing them

7.30.20  11:45 pm   Do you have a tiktok people are reposting your vids on there 

      i have not posted anything on tiktok but i will, if it's not banned by the time i go into production

7.30.20  11:26 pm   what are your hobbies beyond music?

      making videos, to go with the music, or for music to go with

7.30.20  10:58 pm   you better not be procrastinating that thing, do that thing now

      no yea but the problem is it's got 8,0000,00000000000 parts to it

7.30.20  10:46 pm   i've been feeling a bit lost recently. what has been keeping you going recently?

      the morning sun

7.30.20  10:44 pm   Will you run for president?

      if i have time

7.30.20  10:42 pm   who are you voting for?

      was thinking we could all vote for each other

7.30.20  10:26 pm   can you teach me the language of love?

      yes i will try but the syntax is a little bonkers

7.30.20  10:14 pm   Could you please tell us when are you coming back to fix 2020?

      was hoping to fix the entire future, not just one of the years

7.30.20  10:01 pm   why is "this is not a song" in the songs page if it's not a song

      just a little reverse psychology there

7.30.20  10:00 pm   i was on til tok and i saw account claiming it was you, do you have a official tik tok 

      i have not put anything on tiktok yet

7.30.20  9:39 pm   you're almost at 4 million subs! how are you feeling?

      i am hurrying

7.30.20  9:38 pm   What happens when you get lost in the rain?

      it rains even more

7.30.20  9:29 pm   will you ever create a lead sheet book?

      yes

7.30.20  9:20 pm   Do monkeys make you laugh

      no

7.30.20  9:10 pm   What's your favorite lyric you've ever written?

      i would prefer to write a new one to be my favorite
